bruce wrote:
> hey...
> 
> another question....
> 
> can the heritrix app be used to deal with drop down menu items, selection
> boxes, etc...

It does a fair job on simple links hidden in javascript/DHTML by looking
at likely URI patterns, but there is still a lot of link-building Javascript
that eludes Heritrix -- so unless there's another path to the target
resources (for example via a sitemap), it can miss pages.

> just how flexible is the app...???

You (or the programmers who would be building on it) should give it and
its current UI, documentation and source code a try -- that's the only way
to know if it fits your needs and skill level. Everything's available for
free perusal, use, and extension.

- Gordon @ IA
